titles.title: Finding Market-Based and Local Solutions to Ensure Access to Housing Act
Finding Market-Based and Local Solutions to Ensure Access to Housing Act
Finding Market-Based and Local Solutions to Ensure Access to Housing Act

To provide that the Executive order entitled "Establishing a White House Council on Eliminating Regulatory Barriers to Affordable Housing" shall have the force and effect of law, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Finding Market-Based and Local Solutions to Ensure Access to Housing Act
This bill provides statutory authority for the White House Council on Eliminating Regulatory Barriers to Affordable Housing.
